name: The Cornsville Arcade Game Collection
description:
Head to your local arcade in Cornsville, Indiana, where you can play classic games like "Drive to Pennsylvania to beat up a Random Defenseless Family in a Walmart Parking lot with a Baseball Bat" and "Cow Milking Simulator", and maybe find something hidden along the way.

This is one of my weird interactive fiction games made in Twine for computer browsers.

You can also play the game on my website, at newarcade.repl.co/cornsville.html
